code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import randomMovieReducer from'./randomMovieSlice';import topMovieReducer from'./topMovieSlice';import movieSlice from'./movieSliсe';const store=configureStore({reducer:{movieRandom:randomMovieReducer,topMovie:topMovieReducer,movieById:movieSlice}});export default store;
